articles.title: What happens now after Iran strikes US military facilities in Iraq: ANALYSIS
articles.description: Iran avenged the death of its top military official Qassem Soleimani on Tuesday by launching missiles at US military facilities.
articles.content:
Iran responded to the United States' killing of its top military official, Gen. Qassem Soleimani, by firing over a dozen ballistic missiles at two U.S. military facilities in Iraq Tuesday night.

articles.title: Australian family's fortress no match for rapacious fires
articles.description: The wildfires in Australia are so ferocious they have devoured places like the supposedly fireproof home of Justin Kam and Helena Wong
articles.content:
BALMORAL, Australia -- 
With flames climbing as high as a 15-story building and menacing his supposedly fireproof home on three sides, Justin Kam ran to the laundry room and opened the door. Inside was fire.
